Detailed Description

Implements single-type two-dimensional variable arrays.

For example, to construct nxm two-dimentional array (matrix) of type PL_BINARY_TYPE, you can write:

pl2DArray my_2d_array("2DVariableArray", PL_BINARY_TYPE, n, m);
See Also
plArray
pl1DArray
